response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product holds immense value to us, as it represents years of innovation and dedication by our team. Given its unique features and unparalleled capabilities, we believe its true worth lies in the range of $1,200,000.

However, I understand that each decision involves careful consideration of cost-benefit analysis. To facilitate your evaluation, I am offering you the chance to own this product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer includes comprehensive support and maintenance services for the first year, ensuring that you can fully benefit from all the features and advantages this product offers without any initial concerns.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this offer further or if there's anything else I can provide to help you make your decision. I am confident that this product will significantly enhance your operations and contribute to your business growth.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
